CustomField.description: If set, it overrides the Region to which the TC Split 's Revenue Transactions will roll up for Regional Actuals, even if its Project or Resource are in a different Region. Note that either way, the Revenue Transactions will continue to roll up to the same Project's Project Actuals and same Resource's Resource Actuals.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If set, it overrides the Region to which the TC Split 's Revenue Transactions will roll up for Regional Actuals, even if its Project or Resource are in a different Region.
CustomField.label: Override Revenue Region
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Override Revenue Region For Timecard Splits
